This war we fight is for a good cause: We seek to fend off those who would threaten our peace and security.

But it's exhausting. We need some time to just enjoy the peace and security we've been fighting for! As it happens, some of us find mountain climbing a nice break from fighting, and near Mount Tyrannas in Frigid Vigil is a marvellous mountain trail.

If you haven't been there, you should go! Just take in the view. Enjoy the peace and quiet.
